name: SEA CAVES WATER AND ADVENTURE PARK- DESERT FALLS
location: Desert Falls Water and Adventure park
description: One of the largest theme parks in the Middle East, brace yourself for a jaw-dropping adventure at Desert Falls Water and Adventure Park. Located within Hilton Salwa Beach Resort & Villas, Sea Caves Water Park features 19 attractions with 30 rides and slides, including the water park’s signature ride “The King Cobra” and many other attractions including the Kids Ship Pool, the Whizzard Mat Racer, inner tube slides, Surfing Dunes, Family Abyss, Falls Pool and the Wave Pool.

name: 16th Artistic gymnastics world cup
location: Aspire Ladies Sport Hall, Doha, QATAR
description: The 16th Artistic Gymnastics World Cup will gather the best gymnasts of the world for 2 days of competitions.

name: WANDA DIAMOND LEAGUE
description: The Doha Diamond League 2024 is one of fifteen meetings in the outdoor athletics season, organized by World Athletics.  The competition brings together the world's best athletes for an evening of competition.

name: Museum of illusions
description: It is sure to be an amazing and unimaginable experience because whatever you see, especially here in the Museum of Illusions, is not what it appears to be!!

name: Tanzania: Your Special Bush To Beach Safari
Sheikh Faisal Bin Qassim Al Thani Museum
location: Sheikh Faisal Bin Qassim Al Thani Museum, Dukhan Road, Al Shahaniya

name: Doha Quest
location: Al Khaleej Street, Doha Oasis, Msheireb
description: Quest, the ultimate indoor experiential theme park nestled in the heart of Doha Oasis in Msheireb! This themed and story-based realm takes you on a journey through three time-dimensions: the past (Oryxville), present (City of Imagination), and future (Gravity). With over 30 rides & attractions, featuring a mix of adrenaline-heavy thrill rides, media-controlled simulators, virtual reality experiences, laser tag adventures, and family-friendly attractions, Quest offers an experience unlike any other in Doha.

name: Sunrise Escape in the Desert
description: Book your spot on this amazing Sunrise Desert Safari to explore Qatari sand dunes and experience the natural beauty you've never discovered. Enjoy a personalized break at the Inland Sea with snacks and beach chairs.

name: Full Moon Desert Safari
description: An enchanted and remarkable desert encounter. In addition to the camel and falcon viewing at the desert camp, our Full Moon Desert Safari package includes a close-up look at the parched vegetation, which include cacti, wildflowers, and shrubs. This is an amazing experience in and of itself. Discover this UNESCO-designated natural reserve of breathtaking sand dunes, also called singing sand dunes, with unique biodiversity; this is one of the few locations in the world where, at high tide, the sea touches down into the middle of the desert.

name: Arabian Shuwa Beach Experience
description: A favourite Omani recipe, 'shuwa' is a dish of slow–cooked marinated lamb. The meat is coated in a flavourful rub of spices, garlic and oil, although exact recipes and spices used vary from region to region. It is traditionally cooked, wrapped and buried in a pit of hot coals for several hours –producing the most tasty dishes owing to the resting stage when the marination of the meat allows the juices to properly absorb and thereafter cook perfectly.

name: Swing into Golf
description: Swing Into Golf

name: The Beach House Brunch: Street Food Style
description: Make your Fridays more enjoyable as you and your family delight in an extensive and generous feast by the Q Lounge pool side - complete with the spectacular beach view. Come in your most comfortable and colourful clothes to match the chill vibe.The little ones will certainly have fun as well at the kids’ corner and live dessert stations.

name: Dhow Cruise Ride

description: Dhow Cruise (Shared Basis)

description: Private Dhow

name: Swim and Jump
description: Escape the hustle and bustle of city life and soak up the sights aboard a dhow. What better way to spend your weekend. Leave your worries behind and create a moment to remember on-board National Cruise

name: See Doha from Sea - Sunset Cruise
description: A Touch of heritage meets modern architecture during this Two-Hours Mid Day or Evening cruise on an Arabic dhow, a traditional wooden sailing vessel, through the waters of the Arabian Gulf. Be amazed by the stunning views of Doha’s major tourist spots while having Refreshments ( water. Tea, and coffee )

name: Camel Racing Tour (Private)
description: During camel racing season,  we will collect you from a pick-up point of your choice (within Doha), and drive you to Qatar’s racing track at Al Shahaniya.  There you will be able to be photographed with camels, go behind the scenes, see both the finish and start lines, drive like Qataris alongside the many races and experience the thrill and excitement of live races with your guide.
